entry.title: Animated Drawings
entry.quote: Create animations starring your own drawn characters. This is an implementation of the algorithm described in the paper, 'A Method for Automatically Animating Children's Drawings of the Human Figure'.

entry.title: DIY IBM Selectric type balls give ’60s typewriters new life (and Comic Sans)
entry.quote: A Selectric is nothing without its golf ball, but finding one is a costly pain.

entry.title: Timnit Gebru’s anti-'AI pause’
entry.quote: Why would we want to have a world where every single task is done by one model from OpenAI, and the whole world just pays them to do it?

entry.title: A Number System Invented by Inuit Schoolchildren Will Make Its Silicon Valley Debut
entry.quote: In the remote Arctic almost 30 years ago, a group of Inuit middle school students and their teacher invented the Western Hemisphere’s first new number system in more than a century.

entry.title: How Instagram’s logo became iconic
entry.quote: The original Instagram logo should have gotten its founders sued—and, well, it might have if Apple and a photographer with 45 minutes on his hands hadn’t saved the day.
